fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Douse a player each night.
- Ignite all doused targets at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Detection Immune
- Doused targets will appear to be your role to all non-Mafia investigative effects.
- You will douse anyone who visits you. 
- You will know if you are doused.
- If you do not use an ability at night, you will un-douse yourself.
